thread.title: 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa Splits From Gary Anderson, Is Taking 'Time to Focus on Her Children'
thread.title_full: 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa Splits From Gary Anderson, Is Taking 'Time to Focus on Her Children'

author: Alex Ungerman
title: 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa Splits From Gary Anderson, Is Taking 'Time to Focus on Her Children'
text: 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa Splits From Gary Anderson, Is Taking 'Time to Focus on Her Children' by Alex Ungerman 2:49 PM   Playing 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa Splits From Gary Anderson, Is Taking 'Time to Focus on Her Children' Christina El Moussa is back on the market. The Flip or Flop star is single after breaking things off with her contractor boyfriend , Gary Anderson, ET has learned. WATCH: Tarek El Moussa Reveals He Had Testicular and Thyroid Cancer at the Same Time, Talks Split From Christina "Christina is single and being in a relationship is the last thing on her mind," the HGTV star's rep tells ET. "She is taking this time to focus on her children and herself." Christina and Gary had been spotted out earlier this month, marking her first foray back into the dating game since her husband and co-star, Tarek El Moussa, announced their split in December , following 7 years of marriage. Despite the separation, a source told ET earlier this month that filming for season 7 of the popular show was underway, and that the exes were committed to co-parenting their two children, 6-year-old Taylor, and 1-year-old Hayden. WATCH: 'Flip or Flop' Star Christina El Moussa on Working With Ex Tarek, Traveling to Vegas Together: 'It's Our Normal' "Their children are their number one priority. They'll always communicate," the source told ET. "They're going to be cordial for the best of their family." Watch the video below to see Tarek's perspective on how the former couple continues to work together despite the split. RELATED SLIDESHOW
